name: Palindrome
description:
The Palindrome is an ancient place where you will face yourself in a magical arrow exchanging monologue. You move you and you shoot you. You have to be skillful and witty to win in the Palindrome.

This game was created in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

CONTROLS

W: Up
A: Left
S: Down
D: Right
Mouse: Aim direction
LMB: Shooting
ESC: Menu

CREDITS & TOOLS

Game made by Chris Hinz

- Construct 3
- Blender
- Photoshop
- Reaper
- CC0-licensed music by Rafael Krux
- FX sounds from Freesound.org

THANKS TO

Team Bento-Box for brainstorming, feedback and playtesting <3
